data.name: AboutMenuTooltipTitle
data.value: The dialog window that shows you what this application is all about.

data.name: AccountSettingsErrorMessage
data.value: Cannot connect to the server to update your user account. Please check your application settings to ensure you have a proper connection to the database or contact a system administrator.

data.name: AccountSettingsInvalidCredentialsErrorMessage
data.value: You cannot have empty username or password. If you still can't update your account ask the administrator for a solution to the problem.

data.name: AccountSettingsNoticeTooltipTitle
data.value: If you are a dumbfuck like my creator read this so you don't complain that you can't change your username and/or password

data.name: AccountSettingsProfilePicSelectTitle
data.value: Select a profile picture for your account

data.name: AccSettingsMenuTooltipTitle
data.value: The dialog window where you can change your account settings.

data.name: AddressSearchTooltip
data.value: The address with which you want to search users

data.name: ApplicationInstanceErrorMessage
data.value: Only one instance of this application can be run at a time!

data.name: ApplicationSettingsChangeNotice
data.value: Changing the application settings will take effect after restarting the application.

data.name: ApplicationSettingsLoginsFolderSelectTitle
data.value: Select a folder to save your logins into and load them from....

data.name: ApplicationSettingsReportsFolderSelectTitle
data.value: Select a folder to get the report files from...

data.name: AppSettingsMenuTooltipTitle
data.value: The settings for the application. Use this dialog with caution and only if you know what you are doing.

data.name: AuthorisationAddLoginInvalidResultsMessage
data.value: Multiple login results gotten or none at all. Please check the credentials and try again.

data.name: AuthorisationAppConfLoginFoundMessage
data.value: Successfully found your credentials by the configuration settings of your application. On your confirmation by logging in this will be the user you will work with. If you want another user select from the logins list. Every login is saved into the filesystem in a binary format read only this program.

data.name: AuthorisationAppConfLoginNotFoundMessage
data.value: No user found with the specified credentials by your application configuration. Please configure the application with database credentials provided by your system administrator or create an user with the stored procedures and set it as a sysadmin if you are a system administrator and try again. The admin role for the database is different from the sysadmin role and this is for security reasons.

data.name: AuthorisationErrorCancelledLoginMessage
data.value: You can't use this application without a proper authorization in the database and closing the login without even confirming or cancelling it will not help you. Application will exit!

data.name: AuthorisationErrorClientLoginMessage
data.value: This application is only for administrators and employees! Client use of it is unauthorized and the application will exit!

data.name: AuthorisationErrorNoLoginMessage
data.value: No user currently logged in. Application will exit!

data.name: AuthorisationErrorSysAdminBreachMessage
data.value: Seems like you are the system administrator for the database and you have either disabled or bypassed the logon trigger and that's why you were probably connected even if you didn't have credentials to connect to the database. This might damage the system and enabling the trigger is critical. This is an important warning because the system is at risk of data breach in multiple ways.

data.name: AuthorisationLoginAdminNotice
data.value: You are an administrator. You have access to everything in the database. Everything is created, altered and deleted using stored procedures so the database will calculate some of the things for you.

data.name: AuthorisationLoginEmployeeNotice
data.value: You are an employee, you have limited access to the features of this application. Your permissions: 1.Add, edit, delete product images 2.Generate product reports 3.Add, edit, delete and/or generate reports for product orders 4.Add, edit, delete and/or generate reports for order deliveries 5.View logs 6.View the rest of the tables with read-only permissions. The bulk operations enabled for you are for product images, product orders and order deliveries. Everything is created, altered and deleted using stored procedures so the database will calculate some of the things for you.

data.name: AuthorisationLoginEmptyInputMessage
data.value: Seems like you didn't provide any login information at all. Please try again.

data.name: AuthorisationLoginFilesystemLoadErrorMessage
data.value: Saved Logins list hasn't been retrieved properly. Please restart the application.

data.name: AuthorisationLoginInvalidInputMessage
data.value: No user found with the specified credentials by your input. Please input the credentials you registered with or provided by your system administrator.

data.name: AuthorisationLoginNoConnectionMessage
data.value: Application is not connected to the database and login information cannot be retrieved. Please retry.

data.name: BalanceSearchTooltipTitle
data.value: The balance with which you want to search users

data.name: BrandDeleteOperationPermissionError
data.value: You don't have permissions to delete product brands.

data.name: BrandEditOperationPermissionError
data.value: You don't have permissions to add/edit product brands.

data.name: BrandMenuAccessErrorMessage
data.value: Product Brand list access is given only to administrators and employees of this system.

data.name: BrandNameSearchTooltipTitle
data.value: The brand name with which you want to search product brands

data.value: When you click the button you add/edit an entry based on the permissions you have.

data.name: BtnDeleteTooltipTitle
data.value: When you click the button you delete an entry based on the permissions you have.

data.name: BtnGenerateReportTooltip
data.value: When you click the button you generate a report on an entry based on the permissions you have and whether the report definition based on localisation is present.

data.name: BtnSearchTooltipTitle
data.value: When you click the button you search based on the criterias search mode you selected.

data.name: CbSearchModeTooltipTitle
data.value: The search modes with which you want to search entries. All criterias - search by all criterias. None - show all entries. Single criteria - entries that are on one criteria with other criterias excluded. Multiple criterias - with multiple criterias but not all criterias included in the search.

data.name: OrderDeliveryMenuAccessErrorMessage
data.value: Order Deliveries list access is given only to administrators and employees of this system.

data.name: OrderDeliveryNoticeTitle
data.value: IMPORTANT NOTICE: When editing order deliveries keep in mind these rules: 1. The total price is automatically calculated by the system by the product order price assigned to the delivery and the price of the delivery service assigned to the delivery. 2. Always put a reason behind your edits, that's what Delivery Reason is for 3. Client balance and employee balance are calculated automatically upon changing the status so be careful when setting it and use your common sense 4. Deliveries who are completed, returned or cancelled cannot be edited again

data.name: OrderDeliveryNoticeTooltipTitle
data.value: If you are a dumbfuck like my creator read this so you don't complain that you can't change the order delivery data via any operation

data.name: ProductOrderInvoiceGenerationQuestion

data.name: ProductOrderMenuAccessErrorMessage
data.value: Product Orders list access is given only to administrators and employees of this system.

data.name: ProductOrderNoticeTitle
data.value: IMPORTANT NOTICE: When editing product orders keep in mind these rules: 1. The price is automatically calculated by the system and you need to set price higher than the product price or the product price times the desired quantity in order to override it. Price higher than the product price overrides the product price and recalculates the final price while price higher than the final price overrides the final price. 2. Select yourself in the select employee list when editing so it is known that it is you who last edited it and thus receive your salary 3. Always put a reason behind your edits, that's what Order Reason is for 4. Client balance and employee balance are calculated automatically upon changing the status so be careful when setting it and use your common sense 5. Orders who are completed, returned or cancelled cannot be edited again

data.name: ProductOrderNoticeTooltipTitle
data.value: If you are a dumbfuck like my creator read this so you don't complain that you can't change the product order data via any operation
